channel.title: Castlevania:Order of Ecclesia
channel.description:
Anyone from N.America or Japan that has played [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Castlevania:_Order_of_Ecclesia]Castlevania:Order of Ecclesia[/url]? (It comes out next Friday in Europe) Any comments or things you want to say about it, Please Tell me.
"Castlevania:Circle of the moon" was the first GBA game I ever got and I instantly fell in love with it but the recent DS Versions of Castlevania have not been as intuative and fun to play.

item.title: Castlevania:Order of Ecclesia
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Castlevania on NES is epic.
